title: New: The Loft – Rain
body:
Florida duo **The Loft** (Cristían Gomez and Jose Machin) first popped up on the [CitR pages](http://admin.

crackintheroad.com/music/23636-stream-the-loft-anxxxious-a-s-o-v/) back in August of last year, with the release of their debut demo mixtape _**Anxxxious (A.S.O.V.)**_which has since disappeared from the web. Having stripped everything back, their starting again from square one, with the release of _Rain_, a reworked track from the aforementioned release. Part Justin Timberlake, part The Weeknd, it’s sure to build anticipating for whatever is to follow.
